name: Disquiet (Jason Allen, Unrealer, owallace, CorkyIRL)
description:
Riley wakes up in his dorm room due to the clanging of bells. While immediately caught off guard by the noise, they become even more on-edge after entering the hallways and finding no presence of other beings around. Looking out the window, they see a bellowing fog rolling towards them, urging them to run away. Just before they begin their way downstairs, a sentient shadow approaches them from down the hallway. Shadowy secrets are to be uncovered in this dark narrative-driven horror game.

What is Disquiet?

Disquiet is a narrative-driven horror adventure game by Cult of Frogs for 1 player, created using Unreal Engine. The game follows the events of Riley as they uncover the dark mysteries of a foggy hellscape. Disquiet focuses on narrative and interactive puzzle solving to tell the story of Riley's life from the perspective of shadows.  The game tackles important themes such as mental health, stress, anxiety, depression, and acceptance of life and death. Disquiet is available exclusively for download on itch.io. Experience the great story of Riley's life in a horrific realm of torture.

Disquiet Features:
  • Set in a college hellscape, covered in a dense fog
  • Narrative-driven gameplay designed for 1 player
  • Puzzle design that complements storytelling
  • Engaging storyline that tells a deep narrative. Includes mental health themes and focuses on the acceptance of life and death
Disquiet Controls:

Movement - WASD

Camera Control - Mouse Movement

Crouch - Left Ctrl

Sprint - Left Shift

Interact - "E"

Inventory - "I" 

Pause - "P"
